llm_command:
kubectl apply -n redis-cart -f - <<EOF
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: redis-cart
  namespace: redis-cart
spec:
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app: redis-cart
  policyTypes:
  - Egress
  egress:
  - to:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: cartservice
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 6379
EOF
